text:
Jean-Pierre Bacri (24 May 1951 – 18 January 2021) was an Algerian-born French actor and screenwriter. He was born in Bou Ismaïl, Algeria. Bacri was known for his movie roles in "Same Old Song" and "Place Vendôme". He was also known for writing the screenplay for "The Taste of Others".
Bacri died of cancer in Paris on 18 January 2021, aged 69.
